name: operation leader,ol
guarenteed: While you have a few tricks under your sleeve to hack computers, you are much more useful to the operation thanks to your deep knowledge in network protocols and infrastructure. While you can be on the offensive team, your skills are most valuable to investigate your own comrades: finding out who is a liar early on can be the difference between prison and freedom.
description: You are the NETSEC operation leader - your role is to coordinate attacks and to sniff out potential threats to your operation. Although you have hacking skills, you have to focus on other matters for the success of the full operation. Don’t get caught.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: cctv specialist,cctv,ctv
description: You have been hired by the Operation Leader to ensure no law enforcement interferes with the operation. You are one of the few that knows the physical location of everyone and you have to keep tabs on what’s happening by planting and monitoring hidden cameras. Everyone may be working together with law enforcement, hence, the need for some old school surveillance duty.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: enforcer,enf
description: Sometimes, destiny needs a literal push. You know nothing about hacking, but your muscles are going to be a very strong asset for NETSEC. You have no problem in being arrested -again- if this means keeping your partners safe a little longer.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: inside man,im,inside,man
description: You don’t have a high-clearance access at the target organization, but hey, that’s better than being unauthorized, right? You’re just a random, average employee, willing to get your hands dirty for an extra paycheck. You are not entirely sure why the NETSEC group is targeting your employer, but simply don’t care. You’re just not paid enough.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: analyst
description: You love math and statistics. You made that your career, before joining NETSEC. While with the right circumstances you are still able to hack your way in a network, your partners count on your analytics skills.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: network specialist,ns,specialist
description: While you have a few tricks under your sleeve to hack computers, you are much more useful to the operation thanks to your deep knowledge in network protocols and infrastructure. While you can be on the offensive team, your skills are most valuable to investigate your own comrades: finding out who is a liar early on can be the difference between prison and freedom.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: social engineer,se
description: You know your way around computers and can hack, if necessary. However, your social skills are your real strength : lie and cheat your way to get the NETSEC group ahead of the competition
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: blackhat,bh
description: You’re not just good in hacking into target machines - you are also very good in disrupting other people plans. While your main task in gaining control of target machines, the Operation Leader also trusts you will use your skills to slow down law enforcement progress in their investigation.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: improvised hacker,ih,hacker
description: You never learnt anything about this stuff and were hired for different reasons. You will blindly follow instructions, and hope for the best.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: spearphisher,sp,sf
description: While you’re not as good as the blackhat, you know your way into other people’s machines. You’re specialized in crafting traps to aid your lack of advanced skill, either via software or social manipulation, in order to gain and exploit trust from your target.
wincon: Hack the target computer. If we succeed, even if we are arrested we are guaranteed to get out of jail, given who our client is...

name: bounty hunter,bounty,hunter
wincon: Contribute to the arrest of at least 3 NETSEC targets,either directly or by denouncing them to AGENTs with the 'spill the beans' skill. Don't die in the process.
description: You don’t CARE about the hack in progress. You just want some sweet, sweet money. It cost you a significant amount of cash buying your way into the crew, but now, it’s time for a big fat paycheck.

name: journalist,journ,journy
wincon: Survive until the end writing at least three articles in the process. Whoever wins is not relevant to your objective.
description: You managed to buy yourself into the NETSEC GROUP via certain questionable….connections. You’re here to write the next big story, on how one of the greatest hack of all time was coordinated (if successfull) or dismantled by law enforcement (if unsuccessful). Either way, things are looking up for you - if you don’t get yourself killed, that is.

name: script kiddie,sk
wincon: Welp, you are now playing with the big boys and want to go home, but you can't. Survive until the end, do not get arrested.
description: You’re a failed computer engineer, barely graduated (and only because you cheated all your way to graduation). You’ve always wanted to become a ‘master haxx0r’ but really are clueless about IT in general. You’re not sure how you manged to get into the crew - possibly someone is going to use you a scapegoat?

name: resentful criminal,rc,criminal
wincon: Get your revenge: have the Agent Leader killed (even if all in), and get rid of the Operation Leader. Survive this mess.
description: A long time ago, NETSEC screwed you over. Not to mention, what AGENTs did to you. You will have your revenge by making all of them fail.

wincon: Become Operation leader, then get arrested. That's all you want and need: becoming the most famous hacker in the news.
name: sociopath,socio
description: You used to be a very good hacker back in the day. However your mental health has gone a long way ago. You’re obsessed with becoming famous as one of the most dangerous hackers to ever walk the earth.

wincon: Do not let NETSEC win. Survive and do not get arrested.
name: rival hacker,rh
description: NETSEC, our rival crew, is oblivious that for once, we were ahead of them and infiltrated the target already. A great chance to take them down from the inside this time...

wincon: Steal and Upload anywhere the requested intel and do not let AGENTs win: survive and do not get arrested.
name: corrupt detective,cd,detective
description: You've been using your position in law enforcement to pay for an unhealthy lifestyle and various people have taken notice, including the Operation Leader. This will be your last job: cash out and get out, while there is still time.

name: agent leader,al
description: You have been tasked in closing down the NETSEC crew forever - a dangerous task… that you have to do. You can’t resort to violence, but you have the government - and its resources - on your side..
wincon: Prevent NETSEC from hacking the target machine and arrest their original leader, or gain root privileges from their Operation Leader, or arrest every NETSEC operative.

name: field agent,fa
description: You are tasked with the actual arrest of NETSEC operatives, working closely with the Agent Leader to bring people to justice.
wincon: Prevent NETSEC from hacking the target machine and arrest their original leader, or gain root privileges from their Operation Leader, or arrest every NETSEC operative.

name: converted netsec/field-op,converted field,converted op,converted field operation,converted 1,converted1
description: You used to be part of the NETSEC group, until the law knocked on your door. You accepted a deal and now, to avoid prison, you must take down the very same organization you believed in firmly. You will aid the investigation with your field operation skills.
wincon: Prevent NETSEC from hacking the target machine and arrest their original leader, or gain root privileges from their Operation Leader, or arrest every NETSEC operative.

name: converted netsec/investigative,converted invest,converted investigative,converted inv,converted 2,converted2
description: You used to be part of the NETSEC group, until the law knocked on your door. You accepted a deal and now, to avoid prison, you must take down the very same organization you believed in firmly. You will aid the investigation with your network security investigative skills, from within the NETSEC itself.
wincon: Prevent NETSEC from hacking the target machine and arrest their original leader, or gain root privileges from their Operation Leader, or arrest every NETSEC operative.

name: converted netsec/offensive,coverted offensive,converted off,converted3,converted 3
description: You used to be part of the NETSEC group, until the law knocked on your door. You accepted a deal and now, to avoid prison, you must take down the very same organization you believed in firmly. You will aid the investigation with your network security offensive skills, from within the NETSEC itself.
wincon: Prevent NETSEC from hacking the target machine and arrest their original leader, or gain root privileges from their Operation Leader, or arrest every NETSEC operative.

name: runaway snitch,rs,snitch
description: You are panicking, not thinking straight, and rightly so - NETSEC is out to get you and no AGENT can help you out of this mess now. Stop the hack with any means necessary, run away, and start a new life in the shadows.
wincon: Prevent NETSEC from hacking the target machine and arrest their original leader, or gain root privileges from their Operation Leader, or arrest every NETSEC operative.
